sqlMap.select: SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_MG, a.CREAT_DT FROM OE1TNFILE a, OE1TNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY b.FILE_SN
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO OE1TNFILE (ATCH_FILE_ID, CREAT_DT, USE_AT) VALUES ( #atchFileId#, SYSDATE, 'Y')

INSERT INTO OE1TNFILEDETAIL ( ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_MG, FILE_CN ) VALUES ( #atchFileId#, #fileSn#, #fileStreCours#, #streFileNm#, #orignlFileNm#, #fileExtsn#, #fileMg#, #fileCn# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM OE1TNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND FILE_SN = #fileSn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(FILE_SN),0)+1 AS FILE_SN FROM OE1TNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#
SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_CN, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_MG FROM OE1TNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND FILE_SN = #fileSn#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OE1TNFILE SET USE_AT = 'N' WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, LIST.* FROM ( SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_MG, a.CREAT_DT FROM OE1TNFILE a, OE1TNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
b.STRE_FILE_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
ORDER BY a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_SN ) LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(a.ATCH_FILE_ID) FROM OE1TNFILE a, OE1TNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
b.STRE_FILE_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#,'%'
b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#,'%'

SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_MG, a.CREAT_DT FROM OE1TNFILE a, OE1TNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND UPPER(b.FILE_EXTSN) IN ('GIF','JPG','BMP','PNG') AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY b.FILE_SN
